args.title: Customer Retention Improvement Suggestions
args.body:
Based on the analysis, here are the suggested improvements for customer retention:

1. Improve customer service response time.
2. Offer more flexible payment options.
3. Enhance marketing campaigns targeting specific customer segments.

origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
[['InsuranceData.get_renewal_data', {'name': 'InsuranceData.get_renewal_data', 'description': 'Retrieve renewal data for a specific insurance product over a given time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'product_id', 'description': 'The ID of the insurance product.', 'type': 'STRING'}, {'name': 'time_period', 'description': 'The time period for which to retrieve data.', 'type': 'STRING'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'renewal_data', 'description': 'The renewal data for the specified product and time period.'}]}], ['InsuranceData.analyze_customer_churn', {'name': 'InsuranceData.analyze_customer_churn', 'description': 'Analyze customer churn based on provided renewal data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'renewal_data', 'description': 'The renewal data to analyze.', 'type': 'STRING'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'churn_analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of customer churn.'}]}], ['MarketingData.get_campaign_effectiveness', {'name': 'MarketingData.get_campaign_effectiveness', 'description': 'Retrieve the effectiveness data of marketing campaigns for a specific product over a given time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'product_id', 'description': 'The ID of the insurance product.', 'type': 'STRING'}, {'name': 'time_period', 'description': 'The time period for which to retrieve data.', 'type': 'STRING'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'campaign_effectiveness', 'description': 'The effectiveness data of the marketing campaigns.'}]}], ['Email.send', {'name': 'Email.send', 'description': 'send email', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'the email address to send', 'type': 'STRING'}, {'name': 'title', 'description': 'title of email, not NULL', 'type': 'STRING'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'body', 'description': 'the content of the email', 'type': 'STRING'}, {'name': 'attachment', 'description': 'path of the attachment file', 'type': 'STRING'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'state', 'description': 'the state of sending email'}]}], ['InsuranceData.suggest_retention_improvements', {'name': 'InsuranceData.suggest_retention_improvements', 'description': 'Generate suggestions for improving customer retention based on churn analysis and campaign effectiveness data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'churn_analysis', 'description': 'The churn analysis data.', 'type': 'STRING'}, {'name': 'campaign_effectiveness', 'description': 'The campaign effectiveness data.', 'type': 'STRING'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'retention_suggestions', 'description': 'The suggested improvements for customer retention.'}]}]]
请生成一个解决用户问题的计划，计划应该是一个行为列表，每个行为的格式如下:

[{  // 动作的ID  "id": number;  // 动作要调用的API名称  "name": string;  // 当前API的参数输入(JSON格式)  "args": "str(Record<string, any>)";}, ...
]
你可以在计划中想象参数的值，这些指令将按顺序执行。
例如，如果你想调用 `api1` 并传入 `arg1` 和 `arg2`，你可以写下面的计划:

[{  "id": 0,  "name": "api1",  "args": "{'arg1': 'value1', 'arg2': 'value2', ...}",}, ...
]
这些参数将在执行时被替换为真实的值。请注意，参数应该是一个字符串，而不是一个字典。
请在字典的参数中使用 ''，在其他地方使用 ""，不要打印值为 None 或 null 的参数。

你应该只生成一个 JSON 格式的计划列表。列表应该是完整的计划列表，不要有 `...`。
不要生成任何解释 JSON 的文本。
我需要评估某款意外险产品的客户留存率。首先，获取该产品在过去一年内的续保数据。然后，分析续保数据中的客户流失原因。接着，获取该产品的市场推广效果数据。最后，提供基于客户留存率的改进建议。
